ai-tha-ap279:1.1_0: “Most people are on the bank of the rivers,
ai-tha-ap279:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap279:3.4_0: they are sentient beings among the wheel-turning monarch.
ai-tha-ap279:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap279:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmajaka.
ai-tha-ap279:6.1_0: a quail, with senior monks who had gone forth.
